mapper.select: SELECT DEGCS_SVCCD , DEGCS_SVCNM , DEGCS_ENABLE_YN , FROM_UNIXTIME(DEGCS_SVC_UPDATEDATE) AS DEGCS_SVC_UPDATEDATE FROM degcs_data_plan ORDER BY DEGCS_SVC_CREATEDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO degcs_data_plan (DEGCS_SVCCD, DEGCS_SVCNM, DEGCS_ENABLE_YN, DEGCS_SVC_UPDATEDATE, DEGCS_SVC_CREATEDATE) VALUES(#{svcCd}, #{svcNm}, #{enableYn}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), UNIX_TIMESTAMP())
mapper.update: UPDATE degcs_data_plan SET DEGCS_SVCNM = #{svcNm}, DEGCS_ENABLE_YN = #{enableYn}, DEGCS_SVC_UPDATEDATE = UNIX_TIMESTAMP() WHERE DEGCS_SVCCD = #{svcCd}
